project_descr: A project is for capacity assessment of the Joint UN Team on AIDS, to support effective development and implementation of the Essential Services package (ESP) on HIV and AIDS for 128 Community Councils in 10 districts.

outputs.output_descr: Objective of a project is for capacity assessment of the Joint UN Team on AIDS, to support effective development and implementation of the Essential Services package (ESP) on HIV and AIDS for 128 Community Councils in 10 districts. The purpose is to consolidate the HIV and AIDS decentralization process in Lesotho.
